Today, Dan and Jordan check in on Alex's announcement that he pled the fifth about 100 times with the Jan 6 Committee.  In this installment, Alex says some very dubious things, and [[Matt Bracken]] recommends people storm the capitol on January 6.

==Tidbits==

*Alex talked to Jan 6 commission
*Alex plead the fifth over 100 times, according to Alex
*[[Adam Schiff]] is a forger who will frame you
*Alex sought power to help the people who find god
*Alex is finally taking his daughter camping
*Alex pleads the fifth so that Schiff can't twist his words
*Alex pleads the fifth because the case is illegitimate
*Alex wanted to answer the questions, but he didn't know what happened
*Alex is going to answer questions on air
*They have Alex's text messages
*Alex never saw Matt Braken call for insurrection
*Why isn't Matt Bracken on air anymore?
*Let's watch this Matt Bracken report
*Matt Bracken wears an InfoWars shirt for solidarity
*Matt: Alex is a fearless leader who doesn't quit

*Javon Pulitzer, inventor of the CueCat<ref>https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CueCat</ref>, says the ballots were fake
*Matt: act now, or history will condemn you
*Matt: storm the Capitol
*Matt: stop it now or never have another free election
*Matt after Jan 6: Q set us up for antifa
*Antifa lured [[Ashli Babbitt]] to her death
*Alex, [[Ali Alexander]], and Vernon Jones at the Georgia Capitol
*Alex hires professional security, not [[Proud Boys]] or [[Oath Keepers]]

*Alex almost bailed on the Ellipse
*DC juries sentence babies to death for breathing
*Violence on Jan 6 was the left

*[[Stewart Rhodes]], meet bus
*Alex wasn't mad at the crew on Jan 6, he was mad that the Capitol was stormed

==Detailed Show Notes==
